department: ministry of public works and government services
short_summary: Infrastructures for deployable lab for intelligence system
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### RFP Title
W7701-247848 - Infrastructure for C4ISR Deployable Laboratory

#### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number**: WS4566527436
* **Publication Date**: May 8th, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 27th, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: June 10th, 2024
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19609999?extsite=MTk2MDk5OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19609999?extsite=MTk2MDk5OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) is seeking proposals for the acquisition of an infrastructure for a C4ISR deployable laboratory, located in Valcartier, Quebec, Canada. The proposal should include the delivery of the infrastructure as detailed in the Annex Statement of Requirements.

#### Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications, please contact:
Godin2, Joanne (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [joanne.godin2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:joanne.godin2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: None
Fax: None

#### Attachments

All relevant information is available on the notice URL provided above.

#### Important Notes

* Tender expiration has already occurred. This announcement is for information purposes only.
* The purchasing authority for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC).
* The contract value, contract duration, and other details are not provided in this announcement. Please refer to the tender documents for more information.  Additional details can be found on the notice URL mentioned above.
